segments.text: What a typical kitchen setup with cabinets and counters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The upper cabinet is open, revealing the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing the stool to get at those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How irresponsible, sneaking treats like that without asking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilting backward; he's going to break something if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl is encouraging him, reaching up for her cookie too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the sink is overflowing because someone forgot to turn off the tap.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water everywhere, ruining the floor and cabinetsâ€”such a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is oblivious, fussing over one silly plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She should be supervising the kids instead of ignoring the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kind of carelessness drives me up the wall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden view just highlights how sloppy things are inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They all need to snap out of it before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
